summary: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other.
cast: Owen Wilson|Adrien Brody|Jason Schwartzman|Amara Karan|Wallace Wolodarsky|Waris Ahluwalia|Irrfan Khan|Barbet Schroeder|Camilla Rutherford|Bill Murray|Anjelica Huston|A.P. title: Viaje a Darjeeling
